Message:
Okay, we can either
prepare a gift beforehand,
or make one on the spot.

They also provide any
tools and materials we need,
so I think I’ll make some bread.

But, it looks like most people
came with their gifts ready.

Each and every one took
a lot of time to make...
Nrgh... I can’t help
but feel anxious.

Suddenly, the air filled
with a roar of cheers.

Oh, everyone’s looking
at that lady from earlier...

“That’s last year’s winner!”
“I bet she’s gonna take home
the prize this year too!”

Huh...? Last year’s winner?!
I didn’t know that lady was
such an amazing person!

I peeked out onto the stage
and saw her unveiling
a decorated cake.

It was so beautiful,
I didn’t even realize how
much it had captivated me...

My plain, simple bread was
nothing compared to that...
